name: Sport Aviation
about: Sport Aviation Center LLC, located at the Carson City Airport in Carson City, Nevada, is a comprehensive flight training and Fixed Based Operation (FBO) serving the Reno/Lake Tahoe region and California. Our mission is to provide top-tier pilot training in light-sport aircraft (LSA) and weight-shift control trikes. With over 360 days of favorable flying weather, students can complete their programs efficiently. Led by industry leader Paul Hamilton, our full-time instructors offer specialized training in the Sling 2 and Evolution Trikes REVO. We also provide online eLearning courses, aviation e-books, and a dedicated weather system for flight planning. Our facility is equipped with FAA Examiners and modern aircraft, ensuring a seamless and supportive learning environment for aspiring pilots. Contact us to start your aviation journey today.
